siteMetadata.title: Solar Sailer
siteMetadata.author: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.description: I am a developer, designer and product manager from France. Co-founder of Pixelnest Studio.

markdownRemark.html:
During the last weeks, we (Damien and I) have cooked a complete tutorial about Unity and its new 2D tools. This tutorial covers the creation of a very small game from start to finish.

We hope you will enjoy it.

→ You can read it here.

frontmatter.title: Pixelnest — Unity 2D tutorial
frontmatter.excerptLine: We cooked a complete tutorial about Unity and its new 2D tools. This tutorial covers the creation of a very small game from start to finish.
